medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain began recently and is severe, radiating from the left pelvis up into the left flank. The pain is accompanied by non-bloody diarrhea. The husband also has diarrhea. Denies fever, chills, nausea, and vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Atrial fibrillation with rapid ventricular response, Diabetes mellitus, Dyslipidemia, Hypertension, Grave's disease s/p ablation, Hypothyroidism, Glaucoma complicated by blindness, Lower back/coccygeal pain, S/p total knee replacement bilaterally, GERD
